name: cleaning-app-production
description: Application de gestion des agents d'entretien - Production

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.railway:build: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.railway:setup: cd backend && npx prisma db push && npx tsx scripts/smartDailyStartup.ts

author: Cleaning App
